nodes.text: "Dash's theme" is a minor theme used in the Shadows of the Empire soundtrack to represent the character Dash Rendar. It was written by Joel McNeely and performed by the Royal Scottish National Orchestra and choir in 1996.
It can be heard in the track "Beggar's Canyon Chase", representing the scene where Rendar arrives to Luke Skywalker's rescue from Jabba Desilijic Tiure's Swoop gang.
